mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(COLUMN_COMMENT separator '|') DATA FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'c2d2309t1_2' AND TABLE_NAME = 'PRODUCT' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ( 'PRO_NO' , 'PRO_WR' , 'PRO_OT' , 'PRO_CATE' , 'PRO_NAME' , 'PRO_PRICE' , 'PRO_CONTENT' , 'PRO_TC' , 'PRO_TSC' , 'PRO_DATE' , 'PRO_CDATE' , 'PRO_UPDATE' , 'PRO_HITS' , 'PRO_STATUS' ) UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT_WS('|' , IFNULL(PRO_NO, '') , IFNULL(PRO_WR, '') , IFNULL(PRO_OT, '') , IFNULL(PRO_CATE, '') , IFNULL(PRO_NAME, '') , IFNULL(PRO_PRICE, '') , IFNULL(PRO_CONTENT, '') , IFNULL(PRO_TC, '') , IFNULL(PRO_TSC, '') , IFNULL(PRO_DATE, '') , IFNULL(PRO_CDATE, '') , IFNULL(PRO_UPDATE, '') , IFNULL(PRO_HITS, '') , IFNULL(PRO_STATUS, '') ) DATA FROM PRODUCT;
